I have a Struts based web application. One of the features in this File
Upload and Download. 
 
A Document(or File) can be uploaded/downloaded from a web page.
When a file is being uploaded, all the file related details are stored in
the DB and the copy of the file is stored on the server.
 
Now I have successfully implemented both the features using Struts, But I
havent been able write test cases for upload / download using either JUnit
OR MockStrutsTestCase. The Primary reason being, I have not been able to
simulate Multi-part file upload using either of the unit testing tools.
 
I did try it using the MockStrutsTestCase using the sample code provided
here :
http://sourceforge.net/forum/forum.php?thread_id=1265326
<http://sourceforge.net/forum/forum.php?thread_id=1265326&forum_id=121751>
&forum_id=121751
But I face issues then too, It has been listed as the last one in this
thread.
 
I wanted to know if it is possible to simulate Multipart file upload using
JUnit?
 
Regards
Anuradha


  _____  

From: junit@yahoogroups.com [mailto:junit@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of
David Saff
Sent: Wednesday, September 21, 2005 10:47 PM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [junit] Test File Download


Anuradha,

Can you be more specific about the problems you're having?

    David Saff

Anuradha S.Athreya wrote:

> Hello,
>
> I need to test Multi-part File Download with Junit. I'm unable to find how
> to do it.
>
> Help please.
>
>
>
